price: (19) And that when the Servant [i.e., Prophet] of Allāh stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."[1774]
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا
footnotes: [1774]- Crowding on top of each other in the manner of locusts in order to hear him (ﷺ).  "They" may refer to the jinn or to the disbelievers among the Arabs.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu lammā qāma ʿabdu al-lahi yadʿūhu kādū yakūnūna ʿalayhi libadan
